title: Introduction to Statistical Modeling
content: Learn the basics of regression, hypothesis testing, and data visualization for real-world analysis.

title: Data Cleaning Tips for Students
content: Handling missing values, outliers, and inconsistent datasets is crucial for reliable results.

title: Using R and Python for Analytics
content: Discover practical examples of R and Python for statistical computing and plotting.

title: Interpreting Research Findings
content: Understanding p-values, confidence intervals, and correlation in published studies.

title: Forecasting Under-Five Mortality in Malawi
content: I am currently working on projects to forecast under-five mortality rate in Malawi using machine learning models and classic time series models, highlighting implications for SDG 3.2.
